When a group of hardworking guys discover they've fallen victim to their wealthy employer's Ponzi scheme, they conspire to rob his high-rise residence. With a talented cast and a fun, fast-paced plot, this movie is sure to provide some entertainment.

Alternatively, the user might enjoy "Bats" (1999), a horror film that follows a group of people who return to their abandoned village after a nuclear power plant meltdown. When they discover a radiated bat living in their attic, they must survive the night to escape, but the monster has other plans. With a tense and suspenseful plot, this movie is sure to provide some thrills.
